channel.title: Quest rewards help
channel.description:
I was going through my client, seeing what quests are there, before I begin tearing them apart. I got one called Rune Mysteries completed (Though according to RS Wiki this is not a proper quest), and got the reward screen, but without any of the rewards showing. Rewards were given, but instead of on the scroll, a message was sent saying what I got. How do you make it to where the rewards show on the scroll, rather than a message?
[IMG]http://i44.tinypic.com/2hzlk45.png[/img] This is what I currently have. Liveable, but I do not like it this way :D

item.title: Quest rewards help
